# List of Kirati kings

The page is a list of Kirati kings who ruled in Nepal from c. 800 BCE to c. 300 CE.
List of Kirat Kings
According to a chronicle of Bansawali William Kirk Patrick and Daniel Wright, The Kirat kings were:
